element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

i18nDismissLabel.description: Title for dismiss label. Only necessary when using onDismiss.

i18nErrorLabel.description: Title for error icon when using Error Alerts.

i18nNeutralLabel.description: Title for info icon when using Neutral Alerts.

i18nWarningLabel.description: Title for info icon when using Warning Alerts.

onDismiss.description: Function to run on dismiss of the Alert. Adds a close button.

role.defaultValue: 'status' for Neutral Alerts, 'error' for Error Alerts, 'warning' for Warning Alerts
role.description: ARIA role applied to the Alert.
